page.title: 05RECREATION-INDOOR.
page.content: For young people there are many youth clubs. These youth clubs are held in community halls and are open to children aged 5 to 16. These young people meet, play darts, table tennis and listen to records. Discos are held regularly. For the older generation there are many public houses and social clubs where cabarets are held at weekends. Bingo is a popular leisure activity especially with women. There are several bingo halls and many of the social clubs and churches hold bingo evenings. The public library is a place for the whole family. It satisfies everyone's need for reading. The younger children have a separate section from teenagers and adults. There is also a reference section, this is for people to get books to study with instead of taking them home.
